website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, yet durable option – perfect for younger kids or casual gamers who don't want to spend a fortune.
pros: The Anivia A9 headset was aesthetically, quite pleasing
The purple or blue looked sharp against the black headset, and we enjoyed the lifeline graphic on the microphone
The braided cord seemed reliable and included a control for the volume
The set was lightweight and comfortable – a surprise considering the low cost
The mic is retractable and also has a mute option
cons: We found the volume did not go as high as some of the other more expensive headsets

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have any issues with the sound quality coming out of these - the bass is nice and rich, very good tones, mic works well, and these are actually lightweight. The only minor issue is that they're not great at external sound cancelling. So, if you like keeping half an ear open to stuff happening around you, these are great, if you're looking to pretend you're isolated from the world, not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE:They replaced the broken ones with a new set
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the company has replaced the broken headphones with new ones that work well. You can trust that they will stand buy their product and help you if they are defective. Well the company has reached out to me to fix my problem. I will updated if they follow through and resolve this. Quit working after 3 months of use. I bought these for my son, he loved them, they worked great and he said his friends could hear him clearly. A couple of days ago the mic just stopped working and you can barely hear any sound coming in. Too bad these are not worth it. I am going to buy him some turtle beach they are more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: de

customer_reviews.title: Has a terrible echo and my son is constantly complaining
customer_reviews.text: Has a terrible echo and my son is constantly complaining. Never will I buy from this company again. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.M

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but defective 😒
customer_reviews.text: This headset seemed really nice. When I purchased it and finally got it I plugged it in and instantly noticed it would cut in and out. After a month of use I can positively say that the jack gives out on it all the time. I will be chatting through xbox live and all of the sudden you can't hear through the headphones anymore and all the sound will be back on the TV. So I would have to unplug the headset and plug back in to get the sound back into the headset. The design is nice but really defective. I'm returning for another pair of the same. I will update after I try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: Went crazy looking for some decent quality headphones for gaming without burning a hole in my wallet. Definitely found these to be what I needed & more. Works for both xbox & playstation controllers with your basic headphone jack. The mic was clearer than expected & even picks up background noises if your settings are too high. I'd definitely recommend these to anyone! ***9 MONTHS LATER!*** I'm honestly surprised that these held up so well for so long! The sound is already giving out but can't complain for the price & amount of time I've owned these! Still highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maythe Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Good for basic audio use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a cheap replacement so I could continue to stream and record clips on the PS4. The audio wasn't to my liking for recording but it was suitable for hearing and chatting. As long as you're not planning to record, this is pretty okay. Also gave me a rash on my ears and I don't have sensitive skin. Seller offered a refund upon my negative review but requested that I modify or delete my review.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: This headset is my absolute favorite so far! The quality of sound on these is absolutely phenomenal. I don't have to worry about background noise creeping in and the look of these, for me, sealed the deal. The price was impossible to turn down. I wasn't expecting these to be as amazing as they are, the price had me second guessing the quality but I am SO HAPPY that I did. If you're asking yourself whether to buy these or not...do yourself a huge favor and just do it. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: They are purple !!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok obviously i bought because female gamer and loved the purple. But only ear with the mic actually works no sound from the other side . I promise im not deaf its broken
customer_reviews.author: Ariesaphcelie

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for price
customer_reviews.text: Def not noise cancelling, but certainly noise muffling. The sound is good and the mic quality is solid. They’re comfortable to wear, and I like that the mike just rotates up to sit along the headband instead of needing to pull back a bendable wire that won’t stay anyway. Comfortable: check Sound quality: 5/5 Mic quality: 5/5 Noise canceling: 2/5 Physical design: 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mell

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great. Microphone...Not so much
customer_reviews.text: The price of the headset dictates the quality. The sound received is top notch. However, the microphone is not so good. I was happy when I started using the headset and the sound quality I was hearing in gaming. However, when my friends connected online and I began to talk to them, I received these comments, "What happened to your microphone?" And, "It sounds like your talking into a tin can?" And the best, "Who is this?" To sum up, if you're just looking for listening quality, they are very good for the price. If you plan on communicating with this headset, be prepared for less than desirable results.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt K

customer_reviews.title: Makes ears sweat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother to use with his PS4 console. He really enjoys it except after 20-30 mins his ears start to sweat around and behind. I bought him covers to absorb and they help but the material used on these earphones are not the best. More like plastic fabric. Other than that it has been working perfectly for the last 2 months with daily use. He is very gentle with all his stuff so I don't know how the hold up to being roughly used. So far I would purchase again especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Ehh could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: They're not as good as I had expected, but I still like them. Sometimes it seems like it's harder to hear anything in the right side and the volume doesn't go up very high. It was kind of hard to hear my friend talking, sounded crackly and muffled at times, but she could hear me perfectly. Not sure I would buy them again though, at least not for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleLynn88

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset for my sister-in-law. We game together quite often. The set is nice. The cord is made of a rope type material but it's super long. I think it's almost too long. I like the fact that it's easier for her to mute her headset when she's taking a bite of food or something since the mic is very sensitive. Overall it's a really nice headset for the price. If I hadn't have boughten for her I would have thought it cost a lot more. All in all the negatives are minor.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Great mic for the price on this headset.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good headset for the price you are paying. Was really blown away by the mic quality of this mic when I got it. Didn't expect it to sound so clear. The sound is ok well, not much on the bass side, but clear enough when you are gaming. I would recommend this to a beginner youtuber for a kid, or even twitch for them to start out on. The ear padding goes over the ear all the way, and it's very light so doesn't leave a burden on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Really good gaming headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: These block out surrounding noise, sound good and speech goes through clearly. Works well with the xbox and you can't beat the price. My kids previously had and broke their headsets that were just one ear. I ordered this and another brand to try and my kids really like this one. Plus the purple is cool for my daughter who is a gamer :-)
customer_reviews.author: birdistheword328Top Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Too quiet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these. They have a nice design and color. The mic is fine and everyone can hear me fine, however the volume only goes so high and set to max it is still super quiet. So quiet it is hard to hear my team when I play overwatch. Only 15$ so not the worst, but sound quality is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Suuuuper happy with these! So the wire automatically comes fit to a ps4 but comes with a little adapter that you could put into a computer with is super nice for those who PC game as well. They also work for like a phone or tablet which is also pretty cool. Very comfortable and soft. Comes with a volume control wheel. Would definitely get them again if I had to!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Murphy

customer_reviews.title: ... got these out of the box and played a good couple hours of Dragons Dogma on my PS4
customer_reviews.text: Just got these out of the box and played a good couple hours of Dragons Dogma on my PS4! These things are legit. Can't feel any uncomfort after hours of play and the sound is great stereo quality! My only complaint... they are not nearly loud enough. On full blast on my 40" Roku TV I wasn't even phazed. I read a lot of comments but did not hear this mentioned once. This the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good noise cancellation, mic has good pick-up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for use with video conferencing and VoiP purposes. They have a good sound, good noise cancellation and haven't had any trouble with the mic picking up my voice. Solid headset for the price, fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie P

customer_reviews.title: Better than $100 headphones
customer_reviews.text: These work so well! I love mine. I use them for gaming. Watching videos, listening to music. I play with a lot of video game streamers, they can hear me great and my voice is clear and crisp. They are light weight and fit great on my head. I really like that the cord is super long. It helps so much. I have nothing bad to say about these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very weird....
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these. I'm not even sure how this worked but people could hear what I was hearing thru my mic. Let me explain. I would be playing a FPS while chatting with other people on Discord. They could hear ALL of my gameplay, including voice and in-game sound effects and action. Like I said, I'm not even sure how that worked. Ended up getting some Logitech G430 and I couldn't be happier with my purchace. Just a few more bucks for leaps and bounds above in quality (though I do miss the purple color!)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Short-lived headphones
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Only lasted 3 months and one side already stopped working. Now I have to get my son a new set.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the headphone for game
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of different game headphones for my son. Of course, none of them lasted very long ( weeks to months). But he likes this because it is comfortable when it is on. And it is relatively smaller than other similar types. This one is still on very good conditions.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my daughter and she is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she is very happy with them. She says the oval shape ear cups are more comfortable than round ones and the microphone is pretty sensitive. She also likes the nylon wrapped cord because it is more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E. Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Better than our $99 headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son a headset for one console for Christmas, it was 99$ and I just bought this one for the other console. And he doesn’t know how much either cost but said this one is better! I tried them on and they’re comfortable, great sound and does not look cheap or anything in person. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Haley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lasy
customer_reviews.text: Like the design of them and the color, however, within 2 months of the purchase, something happened with the cord or something and all people can hear now is static and not what is being said. Read reviews before I purchased this item and people were speaking highly of these headphones. I am not impressed at all. Money went down the drain and can't use the item after just 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your favorite PS4 Player!
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbor plays his PS4 all the time. We bought him these for his birthday and he really likes them. Now he uses these all the time! He said they are high quality and comfortable. Easy to use and his favorite color too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Mic will pick up everything in your house.
customer_reviews.text: For a budget headset it's ok, but the microphone is so sensitive it can pick up any noise in your house. We sometimes have multiple players online in the same house and it's annoying to hear yourself on a second delay through the other person's headset. Probably just going to cave for a second TB set.
customer_reviews.author: kraken89

customer_reviews.title: One for me, one for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself so that when I play games/movies on my Tv and PlayStation it wouldn’t bother my husband if he was playing something else on his Tv and Xbox. It works great, it’s a comfy fit and doesn’t press on my ears. Sound is good. Bought a second one in Blue for him later so he could play and use the mic, he says he enjoys it too.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My issues have been huge static surges over voice chats when using the mute switch. Cord that attaches from headset to computer is flimsy had to buy a sturdier adapter
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but only lasted me a week
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality but only lasted me a week. Barely used it for like 20 minutes. Very disappointed becaused I liked it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Works w Xbox One X controller
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I plugged them into my controller, they worked. Exactly what I wanted. Side note 10/1/19: if you have long hair, tie it back. My shoulder length hair got caught on the side and I ended up having to cut my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable headphones!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable headphones for long time wearing! Even my 4 yearsold son loves to wear! It also fit him very well ! It has very soft cusion on the top, too! The sound quality isn’t perfect to me but acceptable since the good price! And it’s durable. It still works very well since I bought it about a month ago!
customer_reviews.author: Xufeng Yao

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is awesome! The sound quality from the mic is really good! Better than my $40.00 one that I purchased from Wal-Mart. This is a fraction of the price and sounds close to my big $200.00 Blue Yeti. Love that it's purple! ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound this has to be at least 5.1 Dolby or better for less than $20
customer_reviews.text: These work great for fortnight and call of duty just as good or better than any turtle beach. Cord is long just wish volume had a clip to hang on pocket or my shirt
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Allen

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Turtle Beaches that broke and couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Finally replaced by TurtleBeaches that had ALL kinds of wires going from the Xbox AND the TV, to the controller and across the living room floor. The price was 5% of what my TBs cost and it works 150x better. Plugs into the controller and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Derf 0__o

customer_reviews.title: Im so excited
customer_reviews.text: OMG, IM SO EXCITED, my husband bought these for my birthday as a surprise and it totally was and I love them they were and are perfect. They have a purple stripe(my favorite color) he looked a long time to find these, I've had them since 4/5 and no problems just praise.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazed with product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed good headphones for computer lab at school with microphone and volume control. These came perfect. We used them at home for a bit on all our devices before sending them off to school. They are very good quality and I'm surprised they didn't cost more because they could easily make more money on these. They are well constructed and aesthetically pleasing to look at. She loved them. And I would buy again should the need arise!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Puceloski

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Couldn't hear anything clear and very faint. System using on was ps4. Learned my lesson, you want a good headset, you're going to have to go with bigger better brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One headphone work great. Another one has issue with the plug piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One headphone work great. Another one has issue with the plug piece. It transmits sound on and off. At first I thought it was the iPad cover that did not allow for the plug to go all the way in. We took off the cover but it did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Natanzo

customer_reviews.title: Happy except one problem with it
customer_reviews.text: We got it in and the mic was broke we had to rig it in order for my daughter to use it other than that it works great, I would buy it again it just needs to be checked before it is sent out to make sure it is intact.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor. Rex Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few months now, it's a good product for a pretty cheap price... obviously it's made out of a cheap plastic but the ear pads are comfortable for long use and the sound is pretty good. Compared to other headsets in the price range this one definitely has the best microphone. And also the beaded cord is made pretty well, however the in line volume and Mic mute is a little inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for my boyfriend as it had the best reviews so far on amazon - my boyfriend is ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend as it had the best reviews so far on amazon - my boyfriend is very rough w/ his headsets and typically goes through quite a few of them so far he's been extremely pleased w/ the microphone audio and the actual headphones themselves he said they're the right kind for gaming since others make his ears sweat or get uncomfortable - i would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Liz Strange

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price point, sound quality isn't great.  You do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality isn't spectacular, but it's reasonable for the price. If you're expecting booming base, clear high notes, and great clarity, look elsewhere. For the price though it's probably as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright then crapped out. Noise canceling was never an option, just expect to hear everything going on along with the mic picking up everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids, people on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, worse than generic Xbox headphones but comfortable and decent mic. I do game recordings and this was supposed to be my backup but I will end up giving them to someone else. Just meh.
customer_reviews.author: ChillC

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a teenager in the family. He likes it and says it's comfortable. The padding blocks out additional noise so he can focus on what's coming through the speakers. It's a substantial size. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: boroughplex

customer_reviews.title: WRONG COLOR!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a way to give no stars!!! I ordered this purple headset for my boyfriend since his favorite color is purple and I thought this headset looked really sick so I bought it but I just got it and opened up the box to see a BLUE HEADSET! Like wtf?!? I looked at the barcode label and it said “Black/purple” I was honestly so upset especially since it was for my boyfriend and I was so excited to surprise him, just to let him down.
customer_reviews.author: Moana

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife so we could play Diablo III on the PS4 with our friends. They work great. She said they’re super comfy and she hears the audio nicely. Our buddy said the mic sounds good. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: EmceeGraffiti

customer_reviews.title: ... mine in this week and so far I really like it. The headset feels good
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in this week and so far I really like it. The headset feels good. I'm surprised that the purple bits of the design aren't as vibrant as the picture. The colors are a lot darker. The sounds quality is good but SO quiet. I'm not happy with that at all. The mic quality is good. I have used it on Discord a few times, and my friends said there was no echoing. The only thing holding me back from recommending to friends is the quietness of it. But hey, its still great for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Frey

customer_reviews.title: Spend more for better quality. It'll be worth it I promise.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. They only seem to work half the time and the sound quality is super low quality. These were for my kids and they haven't complained except when they decide to not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: It's better for games
customer_reviews.text: It's cool, I thought I could of used it to listen to music, but my son took it for his games, he seems to like it
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: ... to see if that helps) but otherwise they were great. He enjoys the comfort and the noise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he said there was a bit of feedback on the mic (he's going to adjust the settings to see if that helps) but otherwise they were great. He enjoys the comfort and the noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: Stela

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it! Price is right and colour is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said that you have to spend tons of money to be able to have nice things is a lie. I absolutely love this headset and it works great with PC. I have used it for many different games. Games like Fortnite, GTA V RP, Diablo 3: Reaper of Souls, Paladins, Realm Royale, and the list goes on and on. I bought the headset because I wanted something not too expensive and in my favourite colour. The price is right and the colour is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: vintages

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The quality could be better but they work good. I use them for gaming. They are not noise canceling but they do have decent volume.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! They are comfortable. I can wear them for several hours! I play fortnite on the ps4 and you can hear footsteps really well. Another I love is that I don’t have to take my earrings out when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Lonergan

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was going to give this a much lower rating but my son used them to watch a movie and didn't hear anything else. Maybe it's because I used to game or we have multiple electronics going but for the adults i feel like we could hear everything else. Both when its plugged into the computer and the xbox. Definitely wish I went with the ones I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance! Just don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: It arrive damaged not working. I was told it will be replaced my name is Lashonda Shaw blanding, 3060 nw 57 street ,Miami Florida 33142, # 786-575-0043 didn’t recieved replacement promised to me
customer_reviews.author: lashonda

customer_reviews.title: Returned This Item
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item due to issues with the mic. When I played with the headset in-game, there were many complaints about hearing static from other players.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphone for the price and very reliable when my kids are playing those loud games it helps to keep the noise level for gaming purposes only :)
customer_reviews.author: Marie Casimir

customer_reviews.title: Bad audio
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a month ago and with pretty mild use (less than two hours a week, being used in a stationary spot) they're crackling and the audio goes in and out of the cord sways.
customer_reviews.author: pixie moreno

customer_reviews.title: It’s not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: The right side doesn’t work when using the mic. I like the look, but I mainly need it for gamez
customer_reviews.author: Shiikiss

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset 3 months ago and at first they were great! After awhile my friends started complaining of hearing echoes and now my mic doesnt work any more! I can still hear out of them though. Im disappointed because I love the color of it and the sound quality was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Tif

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: These sound terrific! Especially for the price point. The mute button is a plus. My son loves them! Will follow up with a review in a few months for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Renaldo H.

customer_reviews.title: look else where
customer_reviews.text: they stopped working after not even a month of use. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: phillip hegedus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! they are so cute and comfy fast shipping I am one happy camper! have not tried the mic yet but I will later tonight and I will update!!
customer_reviews.author: Gamer Girl

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to play and chat with them
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the quality. I game to be close to my kiddos. It's fun to play and chat with them. These make it possible and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kkarl00Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about a year and a half and they're still going strong! They're the perfect cheap headset to get you away from Playstation's or Xbox's crappy headsets that break super easily. I cannot recommend these enough! I even managed to talk my friend into buying a pair and he loves his!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Owens

customer_reviews.title: Just ur generic headphones
customer_reviews.text: Works n fits great, dont have ne fancy lights, n when playing a game on chat, audio only comes thru the one ear but everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, nice sound cancelling headset! Plays game sounds, and pics up great on my voice without picking up the t.v. I would definitely recommend and use this seller to replace if this one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very durable. My 6 year old is hell on these things. But it takes a beating and keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: Bgates

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Recieved a headset where the sound on the left didnt work unless I held the wire a certain way that would damage my controller and the volume of the sound is terrible for someone that's use to putting the sound all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo loves the headset. We did have to purchase an adapter for it to work with his Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Gordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far, purchased as a gift for my husband and he uses them all the time. Very comfortable, and noise cancelling as I have to basically scream to get his attention lol
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina P

customer_reviews.title: Some bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I love that they work and I love the cord length they look nice and what not but they do feel cheep so I'm not sure how long they'll last but good so far
customer_reviews.author: thatguyyouknow

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed really.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with our Xbox one. Have since bought an adapter and other headsets. Haven’t used this headset. Disappointed really.
customer_reviews.author: Fredddd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: My dogs got to it.. but it was pretty good, but next time I’ll spend a little more for a better set
customer_reviews.author: Double E

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to function, even a 97 years old lady could easily manage it. The sound is very clear. The ear hooks are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: worked great, suddenly stopped working only had a month or so
customer_reviews.text: I've treated these with great care and now suddenly they are NOT WORKING!! TRASH... buy something better!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha R

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: So far, the sound is top-notch an so is the mic. They fit well and look cool. I will update in a few weeks for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lancianese

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned because they did not work with voice recognition software.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one if the best headsets I have purchased. Mic quality is pretty good, sound quality is even better and these are extremely comfortable for long periods
customer_reviews.author: Lumarei

customer_reviews.title: good for value
customer_reviews.text: i really just wish the mic turns off when it is put up or down not with the switch on the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! There loud and clear! I have the adapter so I’m able to adjust the volume... I would recommend getting the adapter for the controller so your able to manage ur sounds.. there comfortable on the ears as I wear glasses.. and I’ve had it for a couple months now and I haven’t had a problem.. I was afraid of sound quality n quick breaking.. but this product exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: The right side was deaf.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones seemed great according to the reviews. But the second i got mine and put them and played a game of fortnite, i realized that the right side wasn’t making any noise. which really sucked. I’m not giving these headphones 1 star because they are relatively comfortable. But they’re worthless without both sides. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Too qualify. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as birthday present for 11 year old. He loves it and uses it with multiple devices. Shipping was fast. Was thanked several times for it. All good! Was proud to give it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are very comfortable on my ears. I have piercings but they don't rub against my cartilage at all. My only complaint was that it was a hassle to hook these up to my computer for the first time. High quality sound and overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Fears

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones but kinda iffy
customer_reviews.text: When they work they are awesome but they have a short in them somewhere and have been like that since I took them out of the box to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Daughter said they're great when her and her brother/friends play
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and great product works great my girlfriend loves now we can rock COD world war2 together!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Lots of echo!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and was excited to use them, only to find out there is a horrible echo with them. I literally couldnt have any sound going without and echo on my end. Not all that great for a streamer. Sad too, they are pretty comfortable and i loved the volume adjusting on it. Though muting the mic doesnt mute it. Just make a loud buzzing noise. Save your money and get another pair that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones! The sound was a little weird with ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones! The sound was a little weird with my laptop but I'm pretty sure it was my laptops fault
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love the color! Sound is really nice coming out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I thought these headphones would be cheap and low quality but they are really nice and they are my favorite colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Only 3 months in and they broke. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 months in and they broke. I use this for my job when I work from home and my customers started to not be able to hear me. I could hear them but no one could hear me. This was not worth it. I wanted a headset that will work for a while not just 3 months. I guess you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Roberson

customer_reviews.title: These have a great sound! I use every day
customer_reviews.text: These have a great sound! I use every day. Nice long cord with on/off button and volume control, and I love the purple!
customer_reviews.author: marthadoody

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with glasses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift. The recipient loves them, raves about the sound quality. Really comfortable to wear even with glasses. These also look great. The purple is easily a unisex Color too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fortnite gaming!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged for a headset for playing fortnite, but I wasn’t about to spend big on one, these headphones were a perfect choice. Had them for a few months now and they are still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Tufts

customer_reviews.title: I bought the headphones to use with a new Mac ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the headphones to use with a new Mac laptop and Rosetta Stone language programs. They work but you only get sound through one side of the phones. The adds/specs didn't identify you wouldn't get stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality headset
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my xbox one and the sound is great! My friends say that the mic is also pretty good. The quality of this headset exceeded expectations, considering it's price. I definitely would recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Meade

product_meta.title: Stereo Gaming Headset PS4 Xbox One X, Anivia A9S Wired Over Ear Headphone with Mic for PC MAC Laptop Mobile iPad Nintendo Switch Games(Black Purple)
product_meta.description: Features: 1. High Compatibility: This gaming headset can perfectly match with your PS4, Xbox One S/X controller, PSP, Smartphone, tablet, laptop, Switch, Wii U and mobile devices with single 3. 5mm stereo jack (4 pin) directly. A PC Splitter cable with dual 3. 5mm headphone and mic jacks (included) is used to connect with desktop computer. 2. Practical Design: Closed earcup design covers your ears and cuts out external sound effectively, and with none of the irritating 'seashell effect' many headsets suffer; Stretchable headband, no worry about size; Movable earcup (move within 15 degrees). Braided wire, durable tensile effectively reduce the external resistance and lightweight design is more comfortable for long time wear. 3. Superior Audio Performance: Lastest enhanced 40mm Hi-Fi speakers deliver incredibly clear highs and deep, rich bass. Hear every detail in immersive sound. 4. Especially Convenient: Plug & play, no driver needed, 3. 5mm plug for mic and headset, more to ensure the stability of the sound. 5. High Sensitive and Precise Microphone: Headset integrated onmi-directional microphone can transmits high quality communication with its premium noise-concelling feature, can pick up sounds with great sensitivity and reduce the background noise, which enables you clearly deliver or receive messages while you are in a game. Specification: Driver diameter: 40mm Impedance: 2015%Ω Sensitivity：1153dB Frequency range：20Hz-20KHZ Mic sensitivity：-383dB Mic impedance：2. 2kΩ Directivity: Omnidirectional Headset jack: 3. 5mm 4Pin What's in the box: Anivia A9Plus Xbox One / PlayStation 4 Headset 3. 5mm Jack splitter Cable 1 to 2 User Manual Please note you need an extra Microsoft Adapter (Not Included) when connect with an old version Xbox One controller and the headset is not compatible with PS3 and Xbox360.
feature_bullets: Perfect gaming experience: mute button and volume control are designed conveniently for hand control. 3D stereo sound field fully motivate your gaming passion.

Unmatched Comfort wearing: Super comfortable skin-like protein over-ear pads with ergonomic design can reduce hearing impairment and heat sweating, soft memory sponge with Retractable headband fit all the head of gamer at any age. Clear communication: premium omnidirectional microphone can absorb sound sources in 360 degrees, making it perfect to chat with other players.

Amazing compatibility: plug &Play, no driver needed. With an 1 to 2 adapter included, The headset is suitable for different scenes. Support PlayStation 4, new Xbox One, PC, Nintendo 3DS, laptop, PSP, tablet, iPad, iPod, MP3/MP4 Player, mobile phone.

Tips for PS4 setting: 1. Before APPLY the headset on PS4, please test it with your cellphone to ensure it function well; 2. Insert the 3. 5mm jack of the headset into the Gamepad; 3. Long press the PS button to enter system settings; 4. There are peripheral machines, choose adjust sound and devices, output to the headphones, and then change it to all Audio.
100% : 1. One month return and ONE year Service in smart@purchase shop. 2. Your most satisfaction, Our all goal. Just contact us if you have any problem, we will be here with you in any time.
